meanings.definition: Copperases: enzymes that catalyze the oxidation of copper
meanings.sent1: The copperases in the cells help break down copper.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study copperases to understand how copper is processed in living organisms.
meanings.sent3: The copperases in the lab were so efficient, they turned all the copper pennies green!
meanings.sent4: Her expertise in copperases allowed her to unravel the mysteries of copper metabolism.
meanings.sent5: The copperases worked tirelessly, like tiny copper chefs cooking up a storm in the cell.

meanings.definition: Copperases: a group of proteins that contain copper ions and participate in electron transfer reactions
meanings.sent1: The copperases play a crucial role in transferring electrons within the cell.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are investigating how copperases interact with other proteins in the electron transfer process.
meanings.sent3: The copperases at the party were the life of the electron dance!
meanings.sent4: In the world of cells, copperases are the conductors orchestrating the electron symphony.
meanings.sent5: The copperases shimmered like precious jewels, carrying electrons with grace and precision.
